title: Veritasium: This Will Revolutionize Education
summary: Teachers do more than convey information to students. If that all they did, the Internet would make them obsolete.
long_summary: Derek Muller of Veritasium published a video describing the role of teachers in an age of ready-access information. If all teachers do is transmit information, then yeah, the Internet makes them obsolete. But in fact, their role is far more important.
